body.name: domyfan Triple Laptop Screen Extender, 14" Portable Monitor for Laptop, FHD 1080P IPS Laptop Monitor Extender, 360° Rotation Screen Travel Monitor Laptops, Compatible with Mac/Android/Win

features: ✔ FHD 1080P IPS Panel: More vivid images, improve picture quality, clear picture quality, restore true colors. Each screen can adjust brightness, sound, contrast and other parameters independently. monitor extension for laptop with 4 speakers, allowing you to enjoy the beautiful picture and stereo audio during use.

✔ 14" Portable Monitor for Laptop：Whether you're presenting an important meeting or multitasking, increase your productivity by 300%. Removable single screen, ultra-thin 9mm weight ultra-light 689g, equipped with a handbag easy to carry, easy to disassemble or unfold. This portable monitor is a great choice for office meetings, home office and business trips, entertainment games.

✔ Stable Aluminum Workbench: The monitor for a laptop is equipped with a horizontal or vertical 360°rotatable aluminum stand with a height of 4 cm to adjust the position of your laptop, and the high-quality aluminum construction ensures durability and effective heat dissipation, making it suitable for long periods of use. Unlike traditional portable monitors, it eliminates the need to clip the monitor to the laptop, enhancing protection against potential damage to the laptop.

✔ Plug and Play: Only 2 cables is needed for plug and play function. The perfect multi-screen simultaneous and multi-screen standalone display solution for laptop users, perfect for gamers, programmers, financial and investment professionals, designers and anyone who needs a more efficient workflow, packaging includes: 2* Portable Monitors, 1* Stand, 1* User Manuel, 1* Carry Bag, 2* USB-C to USB-C cable, 2* HDMI to MINI HDMI cable, 2* USB-A to USB-C cable.

✔ High Compatibility: Compatible with Mac, PC, Windows, Android, PS4/5, Xbox, Switch and most other operating systems, if your connection fails, please contact us directly, our after-sales team will give you a satisfactory solution. Note: This product is not suitable for MacBook Air/Pro equipped with M1/M2 chips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revolutionize Your Laptop Experience with the Triple Laptop Screen Extender
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Triple Laptop Screen Extender, and I couldn't be happier with my decision! This 14" Portable Monitor for Laptop has truly transformed the way I work on my computer. The FHD 1080P IPS display is nothing short of stunning, providing crisp and vibrant visuals that make every task a pleasure to complete.One of the standout features of this monitor is the 90° rotation screen. It's incredibly convenient, allowing me to easily switch between portrait and landscape modes to suit the specific task at hand. Whether I'm working on spreadsheets, coding, or even watching movies during a break, this monitor's flexibility adds a whole new level of versatility to my laptop setup.Setting up the monitor was a breeze, and I was pleasantly surprised by how well It works with my Macbook Pro.Portability is another key factor that drew me to this monitor. It's lightweight, slim, and incredibly easy to pack for business trips or when working on the go. The durable build quality and protective cover ensure it remains safe during travel, which is a huge plus for someone like me who's always on the move.But what truly sets this portable monitor apart is its affordability. The value it offers for its price point is unbeatable, and it's clear that the manufacturers have put a lot of thought into creating a high-quality product that won't break the bank.In summary, the Triple Laptop Screen Extender has significantly improved my productivity and overall computing experience. Its stunning display, flexibility, compatibility, and portability have made it an indispensable part of my setup. I would highly recommend this monitor to anyone looking to enhance their laptop usage, whether for work or leisure. It's an excellent investment that will not disappoint!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been shopping around for a suitable monitor extension for a while. After watching numerous unboxing YouTube videos of various monitor extension brands and reading online reviews, I decided to go with Domyfan. Why? Well, one of the biggest reasons was the variety of cable connections that come in the box. Domfan doesn't assume everyone has the same laptop connections and ports. All of the other Manufactures that I reviewed only supplied one or two type of connections, which would have forced me to go buy more separate cables. Even if I want to upgrade or change my laptop in a few years, I already know I am covered with the cables with this purchase, so I can still use these monitor extensions. I also appreciate that the cost of the purchase included both monitors. A lot of other brands I saw were priced by the each.PROS:1 - Easy to connect and the cables are long enough to comfortable reach all the laptop Ports2 - Variety of cable types to meet your laptop port options.3 - Screen clarity and resolution. I haven't had any glitches or screens going black, yet (I use my laptop all day long 10+hrs with I am traveling). No problems with extended use.4 - Easy of clean up and pack up after use.5 - Screens, even in a separate case I bought at Office Max, still fits comfortable in a standard sized backup for traveling6 - Domyfan does include a protective traveling case with it, which is a nice touch.7 - 200% more productivity! Three monitors is a must have when working away from home remote.8: You look like a boss with three monitors while everyone else is struggling to work with just their laptop.CONS:1 -It will add some weight to your carrying efforts for sure. I felt a noticeable difference in weight in my backpack when traveling with the monitor extensions. However, I do not specifically point to Domyfan as being at fault here. I think that, regardless the manufacture you go with, the nature of this type of product will add significant weight to your carrying load, especially if you elect to go with the two additional monitors instead of just one extra monitor.2 -Wire management. I am not a fan of wires being exposed so much, regardless of electronics. Again, not pointing to Domyfan here. It's just the nature of the product itself.VERDICT:Aside from the added weight (it's not unbearable, so don't let that be a deal breaker), this is a great product. You could even go with the S1 for a dual display, and still be more productive. I am rough with my backpack, so if you are too, then I would recommend going and buying a 15in - 16in laptop sleeve for the monitors. Even with the gray protective case that Domyfan provides, I felt an additional layer of protection was warranted. I have that demonstrated in my pictures. For now, all is well with the monitors and I am happy with my purchase. It's a great investment to stay productive out on the road!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable for traveling
reviews.reviewText: The screens are easy to put onto the laptop monitor. They are a bit heavy, and tend to move the screen forward. They are clear. The audio is very low, so I don’t use it. If your laptop has 2 USB-c connections it’s super easy. We were able to use one HDMi, and 2 usb c’s. One for power and one for video connection. For someone not well versed in computer connections, it’s not extremely intuitive. Once we got it set up, it works very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Domyfan Laptop Screen Extender for my Acer Nitro 5 (17.3-inch screen), and I must say, it's a fantastic addition to my workspace. The screen quality is impressive, providing crisp and clear visuals that make multitasking a breeze. Additionally, the sound quality is commendable, ensuring that audio is clear and uninterrupted.Setting up the screen extender was a straightforward process, seamlessly integrating with my laptop. It's particularly beneficial for work, allowing me to have multiple windows open simultaneously, which significantly boosts productivity and efficiency.The only minor drawback I encountered was the brace's sturdiness. It felt a bit flimsy for my liking. However, this was easily remedied as I crafted my own brace (as shown in the picture), which provided the extra support I desired. Despite this, I still highly recommend the Domyfan Laptop Screen Extender. It's a reliable, high-quality product that delivers on its promise of enhancing your computing experience.
